readingMnemonic: You’ve probably heard of <kanji>ume</kanji> before, depending on your exposure to Japan, but an <reading>ume</reading> (うめ) is a <kanji>Japanese plum</kanji>.
meaningMnemonic: Aiming your <radical>gun</radical> out the <radical>window</radical>, you shoot at a <radical>tree</radical> filled with <kanji>ume</kanji>, <kanji>Japanese plum</kanji>s. This is, in your opinion, the best way to harvest the plums – shooting at them out your window with a gun.
